TopicTitle: Need copy, undo commands for PS4

Articles.Content: Is there a button combination to copy parts in build mode?  Or one to undo the last change?  Or one to at least release the part you just selected?  So frustrating trying to build and not having these available.

Copy is L1 or R1 + X while highlighting the part or root of the assembly.

Undo last is L1 or R1 + left on the D Pad.

On 30/08/2016 at 5:31 PM, Justin_Kerbal said:

Is there a button combination to copy parts in build mode?  Or one to undo the last change?  Or one to at least release the part you just selected?  So frustrating trying to build and not having these available.

If you click on the question mark located either at right or top of page you can see all button combos
I don’t know about the undo but if you hold square and tap x you should copy the item your hovering over as long as you on ps4 that is
Undo is only available in cursor preset

On 3/16/2018 at 3:52 AM, PrvDancer85 said:

Undo is only available in cursor preset

Not true.  In the radial preset the undo last function is in the radial menu when you press triangle.  To copy parts in the radial preset you have to highlight part then hold down Square and press X.   

Also those posts were from the original version back in 2016.

Edited March 17, 2018 by OrganizedChaos
